Class Canvas.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Canvas.Context
  • Enclosing class:
    Canvas

    public class Canvas.Context
extends java.lang.Object
    The graphics contexts to paint on a Canvas.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
